title: 8/23/17 - America's last bite at the apple?
description:
Time for President Trump to stop campaigning ...ESPN is out of their mind ...What do you believe in anymore? ...How did the evil of the Nazis become so accepted...how did they pull it off? ...Don't allow hate groups to open the door to your mind ..The president gives a fiery speech...who in DC is his ally? ...What was the point of President Trump's speech last night? ...The latest poll numbers of President Trump.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
